cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 275 miles SSW of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward, moving away from the U.S. Mid-Atlantic coast toward Nova Scotia and the Gulf of St. Lawrence

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane/Tropical‐storm watches confined to Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, Magdalen Islands and parts of Newfoundland
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warnings for extreme SE Massachusetts and coastal Maine; hurricane warnings for eastern Nova Scotia
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Outer Banks northward through New England and coastal Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: No significant winds expected at Jacksonville — Dorian is far to the NE.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Residual large swells and dangerous rip currents may linger along northeast Florida beaches for another 24-36 h.
